cab.content: SECRET.Operations.From: Advanced G.H.QPrance.To:C.I.G.SWar Office.El.9..17.10.35 a.m.CP.809. 10.35 a.m.The situation on battle front remains unchanged.Yesterday afternoon and evening enemy made numerous counter-attacks, of which 10 at least appear to have been serious attacks. Only one of these met with any success, and this was only temporary. According to evidence that is accumulating, enemy casualties in all these unsuccessful counter-attacks, especially from our rifle and machine gun fire, were particularly severe.
